author: donaldp
msg: Refactor deployment properties to make it easier to move to deploying based on name rather than by name of file containing application.

author: donaldp
msg: Missed a message from last commit.

author: donaldp
msg: Reworked LifecycleHelper/BlockEntry such that the Block objects are no longer required to implement marker interface Block. (However other parts of Avalon still demand it).
This also means you need to issue errrors when incompatabilities between applications exist (ie Block A is composable but some dependencies are not instances of Component)

author: donaldp
msg: Made state mutation done via final methods.
Also made invalidate set variables to null directly rather than via methods (which could cause recursion).
